nodes.text: Emilio Laiso is a comic book artist who worked on Shattered Empire 2, alongside fellow artists Marco Checchetto and Angel Unzueta. He also has drawn Star Wars Annual 2. In 2017, he was the artist responsible for the art in the comic adaptation of Rogue One: A Star Wars Story during the 6-issue mini-series, and began penciling the Doctor Aphra series starting with issue 14.
